## Crime Count

Crime counts measure the volume of crime at a given location.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlosponcecrim/Slides/master/CRIM100_wk05/crime_count_form.JPG)

## Homicide Count
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlosponcecrim/Slides/master/CRIM100_wk05/homicides.jpg)


## Crime Rate
Crime rates measure the risk of crime at a given location accounting for the amount of people at risk (population size)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlosponcecrim/Slides/master/CRIM100_wk05/crimerate_form.JPG)


## Homicide Rate
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlosponcecrim/Slides/master/CRIM100_wk05/homicide_rate.jpg)

## Location Quotient of crime
Measures level of criminal specialization in a given location by determining if offence types are overrepresented or underrepresented.
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlosponcecrim/Slides/master/CRIM100_wk05/lq_form.JPG)
